pageContent: Purpose: We propose a strategic, computer based, prostate cancer decision making model based on the analytic hierarchy process. We developed a model that improves physician-patient joint decision making and enhances the treatment selection process by making this critical decision rational and evidence based.

metaData.source:
Measuring and predicting prostate cancer related quality of life changes using EPIC for clinical practice
https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/24076307/
